name: py-functools32
description:
Backport of the functools module from Python 3.2.3 for use on 2.7 and
PyPy.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow
dependent_to.description: TensorFlow is an Open Source Software Library for Machine Intelligence

dependent_to.name: py-jsonschema
dependent_to.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-poetry
dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

dependent_to.name: py-flake8
dependent_to.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.

dependent_to.name: py-stdlib-list
dependent_to.description:
This package includes lists of all of the standard libraries for Python,
along with the code for scraping the official Python docs to get said
lists.
